sqlMap.select: select MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ID, LANGUAGE_ABBREVIATION, MESSAGE_KEY, MESSAGE_RESOURCE_TYPE, MESSAGE_VALUE, SITE_NAME from MESSAGE_RESOURCE where MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ID = #messageResourceId#

select MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ID, LANGUAGE_ABBREVIATION, MESSAGE_KEY, MESSAGE_RESOURCE_TYPE, MESSAGE_VALUE, SITE_NAME from MESSAGE_RESOURCE where MESSAGE_RESOURCE_TYPE = #messageResourceType# and MESSAGE_KEY = #messageKey# and LANGUAGE_ABBREVIATION = #language# and (SITE_NAME is null or SITE_NAME = #siteName#)
sqlMap.insert: insert into MESSAGE_RESOURCE (MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ID, LANGUAGE_ABBREVIATION, MESSAGE_KEY, MESSAGE_RESOURCE_TYPE, MESSAGE_VALUE, SITE_NAME) values (#id#, #languageAbbreviation#, #messageKey#, #messageResourceType#, #messageValue#, #site.name#)
sqlMap.update: update MESSAGE_RESOURCE set LANGUAGE_ABBREVIATION = #languageAbbreviation#, MESSAGE_KEY = #messageKey#, MESSAGE_RESOURCE_TYPE = #messageResourceType#, MESSAGE_VALUE = #messageValue#, SITE_NAME = #site.name# where MESSAGE_RESOURCE_ID = #id#
